critical.impact: Nodes not accessible via normal queries
critical.solution: Run cleanup query to connect or delete orphaned nodes

high_priority.impact: RAG queries will fail for these paragraphs
high_priority.solution: Re-run chunk generation for affected SGBs

high_priority.impact: These SGBs cannot be used for semantic search
high_priority.solution: Verify import pipeline for affected SGBs

medium_priority.issue: Only 0.5% of norms have amendment data
medium_priority.impact: Cannot track legal changes over time
medium_priority.solution: Parse BGBl references from XML metadata
